introduction.title: Team Engagement Survey 2025
introduction.text_1: The purpose of this survey is to collect your open and honest feedback.
introduction.text_2: We will use the results of the survey to help us understand what works well at Jardox, and we will also look to make improvements, ensuring that we have a great place to work, both now and in the future.
introduction.text_3: We greatly appreciate your participation in this survey.

survey.site: Please select which site applies to you:
survey.department: Please select the department which best fits your role:
survey.handle_food: Do you handle food as part of your role at Jardox?
survey.statements: Please select an answer which best describes how you feel about each statement
survey.expected_of_me: I know what is expected of me at work.
survey.materials_needed: I have the materials and equipment I need to do my work right.
survey.opportunity_best: At work, I have the opportunity to do what I do best every day.
survey.receive_recognition: In the last seven days, I have received recognition or praise for doing good work.
survey.supervisor_cares: My supervisor, or someone at work, seems to care about me as a person.
survey.encourages_development: There is someone at work who encourages my development.
survey.opinions_count: At work, my opinions seem to count.
survey.job_important: The purpose of Jardox makes me feel my job is important.
survey.quality_work: My colleagues are committed to doing quality work.
survey.good_friend: I have a very good friend at work.
survey.progress_check: In the last six months, someone has talked to me about my progress.
survey.learn_and_grow: In this last year, I have had opportunities to learn and grow.
survey.opportunities_to_grow: There are opportunities to grow my career at Jardox.
survey.paid_rewarded: I am well paid and rewarded.
survey.happy_facilities: I am happy with the facilities provided for my breaks.
survey.recommend_jardox: I would recommend Jardox as an employer.
survey.handle_food_statements: As you have indicated that you handle food as part of your role, please answer the following questions
survey.good_food_safety: Senior management promotes the importance of good food safety practices.
survey.good_food_safety_job_done: I can show good food safety and quality practices at the same time as being able to get my job done.
survey.jardox_safety_standards: Jardox has high food safety standards.
survey.improvements_food_safety: I am able to suggest improvements to encourage better food safety.
survey.food_safety_seriously: People in my team take communications regarding food safety seriously.
survey.understand_food_safety: I am confident that people in my team understand communications regarding food safety.
survey.food_audits: I am aware of the results we achieve in food audits.
survey.comments: Please indicate here any comments you have about working at Jardox:
